markets.question: Will Tesla lose its #1 position in global EV sales by 2026?
markets.description: Predicting if another manufacturer will surpass Tesla in total electric vehicle units sold globally by December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will a permanent lunar base be established by 2030?
markets.description: Predicting if a continuously inhabited facility will be operational on the Moon by December 31, 2030.

markets.question: Which artist will win Album of the Year at 2026 Grammys?
markets.description: Predicting the winner of the Album of the Year category at the 68th Annual Grammy Awards in 2026.

markets.question: Will lab-grown meat reach 10% of US meat market by 2028?
markets.description: Predicting if cultivated meat products will account for 10% or more of total meat sales in the United States by December 31, 2028.

markets.question: Will US median home prices drop below $350k in 2025?
markets.description: Predicting if the median home sale price in the United States will fall below $350,000 at any point during 2025.

markets.question: Will mRNA cancer vaccines be FDA approved by 2027?
markets.description: Predicting if personalized mRNA-based cancer treatment vaccines will receive FDA approval for commercial use by December 31, 2027.

markets.question: Which luxury brand will have highest market cap in 2026?
markets.description: Predicting which luxury fashion house will have the highest market capitalization as of December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will online degrees surpass traditional degrees in US by 2029?
markets.description: Predicting if more bachelor's degrees will be awarded through fully online programs than traditional on-campus programs in the US by 2029.

markets.question: Will commercial fusion power plant be operational by 2035?
markets.description: Predicting if a nuclear fusion power plant will be generating electricity for commercial grid use by December 31, 2035.

markets.question: Will commercial supersonic flights resume by 2027?
markets.description: Predicting if regularly scheduled supersonic passenger flights will be available for commercial booking by December 31, 2027.

markets.question: Which social platform will have most daily active users in 2026?
markets.description: Predicting which social media platform will have the highest number of daily active users globally as of December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will humanoid robots be commercially available for home use by 2028?
markets.description: Predicting if general-purpose humanoid robots will be available for consumer purchase under $50,000 by December 31, 2028.
